statements.statements: if nullsub($L.first, false) then ($L.temp="") else ($L.temp=1 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file)
if (val($L.type)=3 and 11 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="date") then ($L.value="'"+$L.value+"'";$L.value2="'"+$L.value2+"'")

if (val($L.type)=3 and 11 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="relative") then ($L.relativeDate1=nullsub(12 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file*86400, 0)+nullsub(13 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file*3600, 0)+nullsub(14 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file*60, 0)+nullsub(15 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file, 0);$L.relativeDate2=nullsub(17 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file*86400, 0)+nullsub(18 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file*3600, 0)+nullsub(19 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file*60, 0)+nullsub(20 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file, 0))

if (val($L.type)=3 and 11 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="relative") then (if (16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="priortotoday") then ($L.date="date(tod()) - '"+val($L.relativeDate1, 3)+"'") else if (16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="aftertoday") then ($L.date="date(tod()+ '1 00:00:00') + '"+val($L.relativeDate1, 3)+"'") else if (16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="priortonow") then ($L.date="tod() - '"+val($L.relativeDate1, 3)+"'") else if (16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="afternow") then ($L.date="tod() + '"+val($L.relativeDate1, 3)+"'") else if (16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="today") then ($L.date="date(tod())") else (if (16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="now") then ($L.date="tod()"));$L.value=$L.date)

if (val($L.type)=3 and 11 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="relative") then (if (22 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="priortotoday") then ($L.date2="date(tod()) - '"+val($L.relativeDate2, 3)+"'") else if (22 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="aftertoday") then ($L.date2="date(tod()+'1 00:00:00') + '"+val($L.relativeDate2, 3)+"'") else if (22 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="priortonow") then ($L.date2="tod() - '"+val($L.relativeDate2, 3)+"'") else if (22 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="afternow") then ($L.date2="tod() + '"+val($L.relativeDate2, 3)+"'") else if (22 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="today") then ($L.date2="date(tod())") else (if (22 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="now") then ($L.date2="tod()"));$L.value2=$L.date2)
if ($L.type~="compound" and $L.type~="compoundend") then ($L.type=3 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file)
$L.array.flag=jscall("tableFunctions.getFieldType", 2 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file, tablename in $L.file, true)

if (val(6 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file)=3 and 11 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="relative" and 16 in $L.i in filterList in $L.file="today" and $L.type="eq") then ($L.type="isbetween";$L.value="date(tod())";$L.value2="date(tod())+ '23:59:59'")
